reviewtext: The keyboard is adequate.  I like the feel of it and the positioning of the hands.  However, I have one rather large complaint to make: When typing certain words, namely those that end in "nce," the letter u mysteriously appears at the end of it.  I have tested my theory with numerous words, and they all seem to end with a u, even though it wasn't typed.  This appears to happen when I'm typing at a fast pace.  I am going to see if this is just a defect and see if I can get another one.  Otherwise, just a mixed positive/negative review.
